On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of the Trump administration’s agenda.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will weigh in on the Trump administration’s new Afghanistan policy.
We’ll also hear from legendary Boston Red Sox ace Curt Schilling, the host of Breitbart radio’s Whatever It Takes.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Rep. Ron DeSantis (R-FL) will discuss the Senate moving forward on a repeal of Obamacare.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
